Gordon, there is a Japanese expression I cannot remember correctly ( I can =
remember the function of the expression ) which was something like dogi wol=
a ( I know that is spelt wrong, Tom, help me out here ) who's job it was to=
 carry around all the dirty dogi for the Karate-ka and wash them for the se=
niors.  You need an equivalent here to carry all your swords for you. A por=
ter of sorts, one of course that can be trusted.

Rich
